EmailTemplate.subject: Your VMTurbo Jumpstart Recording
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> Our Apologies For Technical Difficulties During Your Customer Jumpstart Click Here to View Recording <http://bit.ly/1cBuQID> Dear {{lead.first name:default=Sir or Madam}}:
We apologize for the technical difficulties experienced during today's live VMTurbo Customer Jumpstart training, and any inconvenience this may have caused you and your team. Please click here to watch a recording of the training <http://bit.ly/1cBuQID>. Thank you for your business and the trust you place in VMTurbo.
Sincerely, VMTurbo Customer Success View Now <http://bit.ly/1cBuQID> 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
